tool_description: Creates comprehensive test configurations for load and performance testing scenarios, defining test parameters, duration, and success criteria.

test_name.description: Unique identifier for the test configuration

target_url.description: Base URL of the web application to test

test_duration_minutes.description: Duration of the test in minutes (1-1440)

max_response_time_ms.description: Maximum acceptable response time in milliseconds

error_messages: Invalid test duration: Duration must be between 1 and 1440 minutes
Invalid URL format: Provide a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL
Invalid response time threshold: Must be between 100 and 60000 milliseconds
Invalid success rate: Must be between 0 and 100 percent
usage: Specify test_name, target_url, and test_duration_minutes. Optionally configure max_response_time_ms and success_rate_threshold to customize pass/fail criteria.

config_id.description: Unique identifier for the created configuration

estimated_resources.description: Estimated resource requirements for the test
